title: Avanti GRO24P0W GRO24 24" Gas Range Oven with Solid Metal Door, in White
description: Save kitchen space with this compact, white range from Avanti. The perfect compact gas range for the office, studio apartment, RV, tiny home, condo, vacation home, or anywhere you need to save space in a small kitchen. This 24-inch wide range features 4 burners (9,000 BTU each), a broiler drawer (10,000 BTU) that comes with a broiling pan, and a storage drawer at the bottom.
